org.sikuli.script

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sikuli.script.Location

  • public class Location
extends java.lang.Object
    A point like AWT.Point using global coordinates, hence modifications might move location out of any screen (not checked as is done with region)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int x 
      int y 

    • Constructor Summary

      Location(java.awt.Point point)

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Location above(int dy)
      creates a point at the given offset above, might be negative

      • grow

        public Region grow(int CREATE_X_DIRECTION,
          int CREATE_Y_DIRECTION,
          int w,
          int h)
        create a region with a corner at this point
        as specified with x y
        0 0 top left
        0 1 bottom left
        1 0 top right
        1 1 bottom right
        Parameters:
        CREATE_X_DIRECTION - == 0 is left side !=0 is right side, see Region.CREATE_X_DIRECTION_LEFT, Region.CREATE_X_DIRECTION_RIGHT
        CREATE_Y_DIRECTION - == 0 is top side !=0 is bottom side, see Region.CREATE_Y_DIRECTION_TOP, Region.CREATE_Y_DIRECTION_BOTTOM
        w - the width
        h - the height
        Returns:
        the new region
